name: A Thousand Words To Tell I Love You
name_original: A Thousand Words To Tell I Love You
description:
A Thousand Words To Tell I Love You

It was a not-so-special day, until you saw her. 

An angel. A beautful angel.

And you decided it was your chance to impress her using your flowering 
language.

But you did not consider your anxiety... 😰

This game was made during the "Quarantine Jam" using Godot Engine: https://godotengine.org/

Martian Nipple is an Italian game dev team:

  • da_slang - Programming, Music
  • Giovanni Sordetti (@malvagio_gionni) - Art, GUI
  • Vincenzo Dante Colangelo (@b_cenz) - Art, Extra assets
